caption.title: Viral load in D.Â melanogaster lines carrying different alleles of CHKov1 and p62.
caption.p: Each point is the viral load of a separate inbred fly line carrying the resistant (Res) or susceptible (Sus) allele of P62 or CHKov1. Horizontal bars are medians. Viral load was measured 15 days post infection by quantitative RT-PCR relative to a Drosophila reference gene ( RpL32).
